channel.title: Chest/Furnace Lock errors
channel.description: I have had many issues with the locking system for chests and furnaces. My most recent one involves me being locked out of my own chest and furnace; even the /co inspect proves its mine. I was mining the day before the incident. When i came back, my chest full of iron and armour and such and my furnace loaded with gold was locked. I was killed by a creeper while trying to sort it out, and I now have a chest full of iron beside me as i am struggling with wooden tools. PLEASE FIX THIS PROBLEM!!! Has anyone else had this issue or others like it? This is for the admins and moderators. I WANT MY CHEST AND FURNACE BACK!!!

item.title: Chest/Furnace Lock errors
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Also, if Relmitos is telling the truth about them being under his house, then you’re probably gonna have to move them too lol

Read full topic

item.title: Chest/Furnace Lock errors
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Well, OP, your friend has to do /cmodify Pyromaniac379 then hit the chest/furnace so you can use those containers.

Read full topic

item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Tom:

Do you have the coordinates of the containers?

Underneath my house…
And they’re actually not locked by op, but by his roomie.
